Title: Tombiruo
Writer: Yasmin Yaacob, Chi-Ren Choong, Ramlee Awang Murshid (novel)
Actors: Zul Ariffin, Farid Kamil, Nabila Huda, Faizal Hussein
Plot: Tombiruo is a troubled young man, deformed, dutiful and burdened with powers that do not bend to his will. The tragic death of his father causes Tombiruo to seek revenge and punish those responsible.
